description: This file defines a front-end UI component for displaying quiz results, including score and a restart button, using the LightningJS framework and custom components.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the Results page, displaying score and restart button.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the component's visual layout with placeholders for dynamic data.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initial state setup with position, size, color, and text properties.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns child components used within this component, specifically the Button component.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initialization method that retrieves score data from the router state and updates the display text.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up button press handler to navigate back to the home route.
